participant_2.background:
I enjoy dressing up as a spooky creature for Halloween.
I made many memories with my family last year.
everyone says my pecan pie is the best they have ever had.
I have worked at my current job for two years and I am looking forward to moving to a new home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art.
i am a humble baker.

content.text: Hey there! Not much, just hanging out.
Same here. I'm in school right now, getting ready for finals.
Oh, that sounds tough. Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so. What are you up to these days?
I'm working on a new project. I'm a humble baker and I'm trying to perfect my pecan pie recipe.
Oh, that's awesome! I love pecan pie. Do you have any tips for making it?
Sure! I always use real butter and fresh pecans. And I make sure to bake it until the crust is nice and golden brown.
Thanks for the tips! I'll have to try making it myself sometime.
You're welcome! I'm sure you'll love it.
I'm sure I will! What's your favorite thing about Halloween?
I love dressing up as a spooky creature! It's so much fun to let loose and be someone else for a night.
Me too! I love coming up with a creative costume and seeing how people react to it.
I know, right? It's the best.
Well, I should probably get back to studying. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Good luck on your finals
